text: Aur tum log uss waqt ko yaad kero! Jab kay Allah tum say unn do jamaton mein say aik ka wada kerta tha kay woh tumharay haath aajaye gi aur tum iss tamanna mein thay kay ghair musallah jamat tumharay haath aajaye aur Allah Taalaa ko yeh manzoor tha kay apney ehkaam say haq ka haq hona sabit kerdey aur inn kafiron ki jarr kaat dey
